spanGrp.span: Let’s say, that a boy and a girl love each other.
Then the boy’s family come to the girl’s family and they arrange the date of the wedding.
sora ištem gälierlär onnarın ojah bizım ojah dagavarit šei edierıh söilierıh danı šei dagavaritsa edierıh näsıl olajah sora näsıl olajah dügün olajah näsıl
A few people come to give a ring to a girl.
az halh onnardanda az halh gälier bizdändä az halh üzük tahierlär ištem birbirınä
So their family will come and arrange the day of the wedding with our family.
ištem onnarın semya gälier bizım semya dagavaritsa edierıh ambu güni dapustim olajah toy
They already gave a ring to a girl.
Then people get ready for the wedding.
sora uže halh gatovitsa edier toya dügünä
Many people will be at the wedding.
There are people from entire villages at the wedding.
sağ kövün halhi olier dügündä čoği
